properties.title: Water park and spa in Pontresina
properties.abstract: The Bellavita water park and spa in Pontresina offers a water adventure and experience in an Alpine setting. The water park has a lot to offer, providing facilities for both sports and recreation. The indoor pool is connected to a heated outdoor pool.
properties.description:
Bellavita water park and spa has an adventurous 75-metre black-hole slide and a water recreation area, which are a hit with older children, and a toddlers’ pool. Adults can relax in the 25-metre swimming pool, the wellness centre or the lounge areas. A 1-metre diving board is available for the brave. 

Spa area: Wellness in the heart of the Engadine mountains. The wellness area is an oasis of relaxation and well-being. A place of warmth for body, mind and soul – truly a place to relax and let go. The relaxing atmoshpere at the Bellavita spa and the indescribable view out across the Alps make for an unforgettable experience. Spa facilities include a Finnish sauna, a bio sauna, a steam bath, feature showers, a Kneipp pool, a cold-water pool with a waterfall, a warm-water pool, a relaxation area with an open fireplace and a drinking fountain, a relaxation area and a sunbathing terrace looking out over the mountain landscape.
